answers.answer: Ya its normal. Im also 26 weeks in the same boat. I can feel my blood pulsing so hard when i lay down and feel out of breath. If i walk up the stairs i have to catch my breath lol.
As long as your blood pressure and diabetes test are ok then you should be fine.
Okay thanks! It *****!! I feel so old lol and have no idea how im gonna make it the next 3 months if I can barely do it now! Sorry your goin through the same, but glad im not alone at least. :/
Ive had trouble breathing too. It can ve very scary. Dr. Says its normal. Im 32 weeks now

question: I'm 26 weeks, and lately i'm getting out of breath a lot! I hear its normal,  but I can be laying in bed being still and it feels like I just got done running a marathon because my heart is pounding and its hard to breathe. Any advice or has anyone else had this problem???
title: Trouble Breathing??
